name: WKContentRuleListStore
desc: An object that contains the rules for how to load and filter content in the web view.

items.name: class func `default`() -> Self!
items.desc: Returns the default content rule list store.

items.name: init!(url: URL!)
items.desc: Creates a new content rule list store in the specified directory.

items.name: func compileContentRuleList(forIdentifier: String!, encodedContentRuleList: String!, completionHandler: ((WKContentRuleList?, Error?) -> Void)!)
items.desc: Compiles the specified JSON content into a new rule list and adds it to the current data store.

items.name: func removeContentRuleList(forIdentifier: String!, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)!)
items.desc: Removes a rule list from the current data store asynchronously.

items.name: func getAvailableContentRuleListIdentifiers((([String]?) -> Void)!)
items.desc: Fetches the identifiers for all rule lists in the store asynchronously.

items.name: func lookUpContentRuleList(forIdentifier: String!, completionHandler: ((WKContentRuleList?, Error?) -> Void)!)
items.desc: Searches asynchronously for a specific rule list in the data store.
